item.title: Two, including 10-year-old, die after drowning in Raichur district
item.description:
<![CDATA[RAICHUR: Two people, including a 10-year-old boy, died after drowning in separate cases in the district on Tuesday.
Hussaini, a resident of Lakkandinni village in Sirwar taluk, had gone for a swim with his friends in a lake as schools are closed for the summer vacation. As he did not know how to swim properly, he drowned ad died. The body was handed over to the family after autospy and a case was registered at the Sirwar police station.
In another incident, 27-year-old Suresh Gouda of Nehal vi...]]>

item.title: Centre ignoring requests for AIIMS in Raichur: Minister Patil
item.description: <![CDATA[Hubballi: Medical education minister Sharan Prakash Patil said the state govt made several requests to the Union govt to set up AIIMS in Raichur , however, the Centre did not respond to them.All opposition leaders, led by chief minister Siddaramaiah, appealed to Prime Minister Narendra Modi , without any party affiliation, to establish the AIIMS, however, it is not clear why the central govt is hesitating over the announcement, Patil said here on Tuesday.About the shortage of medicine at Karnata...]]>
item.author: Tnn
